css: .cover-immobilien-experten-section { padding: 6rem 0; } .container { max-width: 1100px; margin: 0 auto; display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr; gap: 3rem; align-items: center; } @media(min-width: 768px) { .container { grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr; } } h1 { font-size: clamp(2.5rem, 5vw, 3.5rem); margin-bottom: 1rem; } .content p { margin-bottom: 2rem; } .btn-primary { padding: 0.8rem 2rem; background-color: var(--color-primary); color: var(--color-light); border-radius: 0.5rem; text-decoration: none; } .image img { width: 100%; border-radius: 1rem; box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(0,0,0,0.1); }

de.name: Immobilien Experten
de.title: Ihre Experten für Traumimmobilien
de.subtitle: Finden Sie Ihr perfektes Zuhause mit unserem engagierten Team.

en.name: Real Estate Experts
en.title: Your Experts for Dream Properties
en.subtitle: Find your perfect home with our dedicated team.

ar.name: خبراء العقارات
ar.title: خبراؤك في عقارات الأحلام
ar.subtitle: ابحث عن منزلك المثالي مع فريقنا المتفاني.
